articles.author: Michael Sainato
articles.title: More than 170m Americans under heat alerts as heatwave expands - The Guardian US
articles.description: Between 250 and 275 million will face heat indexes of 90F as heatwave moves into parts of Great Plains, midwest and north-east
articles.content: Over 170 million Americans are under heat alerts this week, according to the National Weather Service, as a heat wave that has affected the southern US for weeks has expanded into parts of the Great … [+7898 chars]

articles.title: USWNT vs. Netherlands player ratings: Lindsey Horan, Rose Lavelle save USA as Vlatko Andonovski limits subs - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Americans got a point in another match where they were far from their best
articles.content: The United States women's national team settled for a 1-1 draw against the Netherlands on Wednesday night. The two teams battled for supremacy in Group E but will need the final matchday to determine… [+3577 chars]

articles.description: The Next supercontinent is in the making. Today, there are seven continents. Some 200 million years from now there will be just one. Geophysicist Ross Mitche...
